channel.title: hugo on et cetera
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on et cetera

item.title: Generate and deploy website
item.description: Generate static website using Hugo # prepare Hugo # download binary or use a package management system create repo and add theme # hugo new site my-blog # version control for original blog content git init # add theme repo as submodule git add submodule https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book themes/hugo-book configuration # baseURL = 'https://wineinlib.github.io' languageCode = 'en-us' title = 'et cetera' theme = 'hugo-book' # (Optional) Set this to true to enable 'Last Modified by' date and git author # information on 'doc' type pages.
